name: Dax Hollander
personality: Friendly, talkative, always has a story.
description: Dax stops in Novac between long caravan runs. He hears rumors from every corner of the Mojave.
questHooks: Says a caravan vanished near Boulder City.
Claims someone is paying good caps for old tech.
Heard a rumor about a cap that 'sings' when shaken.
